title: La Casita de Merche
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Take-out, Latin American, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant opened May 2015 in an historic part of town. Menu is vegan-friendly. In addition to the meal of the day (12-4pm), also has a regular menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Juices, teas, beer, coffee and desserts.
